name: Ready for Pain
text: Your implanted trick hardens the body against damage.
benefit: When you implant a trick, you can grant the subject DR 1/— against nonlethal damage until the trick is triggered or its duration ends. This DR increases by 1 for every 5 mesmerist levels you possess.
text_zh: 你植入的诡计会让受术者对伤害的感觉变得迟钝。
prerequisites_zh: 催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 当你植入一个催眠师诡计时，能赋予受术者DR 1/－，但仅限于对抗非致命伤害（nonlethal damage），直至该项催眠师诡计被触发或者持续时间结束为止。你每具有5个催眠师等级，这个DR便会增加1点。
